description: two women in garden; woman at L is holding a basket with flowers, holding one of the flowers up toward woman at R who holds out a green bowl and pulls on a banana leaf plant above her head; towering scholar's rock at R with holes at R and bamboo

title: Chinese Beauty and Attendant
